title: Panel, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: cross stitch embroidery
description: Panel of coarse cotton embroidered at one end in red silk with sections in violet. The other end shows embroidery in yellow-green and pale blue. Highly conventionalized border designs and stylized trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 19th century.Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: cross stitch embroidery. 1949-114-1.
